overview: Harry Hiles is an accomplished IT professional with an extensive background in information technology. He is president and owner of HBH Technology LLC and is ITIL V3 Foundation certified. His current specialties include IT service management, services architecture, project management, business analysis, and strategic development. Harry is a strong advocate for ITIL, cloud computing, open source, and wireless networking. Follow him on twitter (twitter.hbhtech.com), LinkedIn (linkedin.hbhtech.com), company website (www.hbhtech.com) and blog (blog.hbhtech.com).
